name: Virulence (Trabasura)
description:
vir·u·lence

/ˈvir(y)ələns/

noun

  1.  the severity or harmfulness of a disease or poison.
Looking for work?

     Finding a job during a health crisis is hard enough, but working at a busy research institute might be the opportunity of a lifetime.

     The Molecular Innovation and Nutrition Institute, has started researching how to combat the Viroid plague, but the only way to get more info is to fight the virus on its own turf.

     While the data drone collects information on the virus, your job is to defend it with a combination of luck, skill, and some good old M.I.N.I. Microbots. Do you think you have what it takes? Apply today to find out!

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move

P - Pause

Space - Jump

T - Turret View

Lmb  - Shoot/Place Turret
